text: Sometimes I just want to die from the pressureSometimes I just want to die from the pressure So all my life  I ve been a very feminine girl  That was very convinient for me in terms of societal roles  Though I was very passionate about my hate of gender roles and didn t want them to exist  I knew they were just constructs that weren t  real  so to say  and I found them so dumb and didn t understand why people didn t question them  were ok with them and just followed them  I come to discover   months ago that I am not cis Oh  that makes a lot of sense now I actually am a very femenine boy  So that s why I hated gender roles so much  The only masculine things about me would be the flat chest and male genitalia that I want and my male pronouns  literally those are the only things Now  I really dislike being called and seen as a girl  but I prefer to stay in the closet because I feel the pressure to be masculine and the expectations that come with being male would be way worse for me  I feel all this pressure and discomfort towards society no matter what gender I m seen as  Even if people knew I m a boy  they probably wouldn t even consider me one because they think feminine immediately and undeniably equals the female gender  There s no other way around it in their heads  This is even worse and stronger in my culture  I m latino  Most people don t even accept gay people here  which I also happen to be  much less trans people  There are hate crimes committed against us and the authorities do nothing Someone could tell me I could move to the US or whatever but since I m latino  that s terrifying  I way be white passing to some people  but I want to live with my sister who s not   I just feel like there s very little people in the world that would truly see me and accept me as I am  That makes me feel depressed  Idk if I ll ever be able to truly be myself This is a throwaway account  in case you look for more of my posts or something
summary: All my life I've been a very feminine girl. I hate being called and seen as a girl but I prefer to stay in the closet because I feel the pressure to be masculine and the expectations that come with being male would be worse for me than being a boy.
cleaned: life feminine girl hate call see girl prefer stay closet feel pressure masculine expectation come male bad boy
